author: Tom Carreras
title: What Tariffs Will — and Won’t — Change for U.S. Bitcoin Miners
description: Hashrate growth is going to slow down in the United States. But it won’t be just because of tariffs.
content:
Will tariffs end the golden age of bitcoin mining in America?
After China banned crypto in the summer of 2021, a huge chunk of the mining industry was forced to relocate to Kazakhstan, Russia, Canad… [+9910 chars]
